pr_title: #10645 add new twisted horns slayer helm to its respective mappings

timeline.message:
#10645 add new twisted horns slayer helm to its respective mappings
Add TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET, TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET_I, and TWISTED_HORNS to ALL_SLAYER_ITEMS
Add TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET, TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET_I, and TWISTED_HORNS to ITEM_BLACK_MASK

timeline.bodyText:
The Horns should be in their own mapping; How you've got it written now means the Twisted Horns use the value of the Black Mask.
Look at how the Bonecrusher Necklace is mapped (lines 230 and 231)
timeline.author: Hydrox6
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -214,7 +214,7 @@
 		BLACK_MASK, BLACK_MASK_I, BLACK_MASK_1, BLACK_MASK_1_I, BLACK_MASK_2, BLACK_MASK_2_I, BLACK_MASK_3, BLACK_MASK_3_I, BLACK_MASK_4, BLACK_MASK_4_I, BLACK_MASK_5,
 		BLACK_MASK_5_I, BLACK_MASK_6, BLACK_MASK_6_I, BLACK_MASK_7, BLACK_MASK_7_I, BLACK_MASK_8, BLACK_MASK_8_I, BLACK_MASK_9, BLACK_MASK_9_I, BLACK_MASK_10_I,
 		SLAYER_HELMET, SLAYER_HELMET_I, BLACK_SLAYER_HELMET, BLACK_SLAYER_HELMET_I, PURPLE_SLAYER_HELMET, PURPLE_SLAYER_HELMET_I, RED_SLAYER_HELMET, RED_SLAYER_HELMET_I,
-		GREEN_SLAYER_HELMET, GREEN_SLAYER_HELMET_I, TURQUOISE_SLAYER_HELMET, TURQUOISE_SLAYER_HELMET_I, HYDRA_SLAYER_HELMET, HYDRA_SLAYER_HELMET_I),
+		GREEN_SLAYER_HELMET, GREEN_SLAYER_HELMET_I, TURQUOISE_SLAYER_HELMET, TURQUOISE_SLAYER_HELMET_I, TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET, TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET_I, TWISTED_HORNS, HYDRA_SLAYER_HELMET, HYDRA_SLAYER_HELMET_I),

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for the review. Do you mean like this:
ITEM_TWISTED_HORNS(TWISTED_HORNS, SLAYER_HELMET, SLAYER_HELMET_I),
replies.author: leopluerodon

replies.bodyText:
That looks correct.
The helmets should be kept in the Black Mask list as well, since they still break down into that.
replies.author: Hydrox6

timeline.bodyText: The horns should not be here, since they do not have the functionality of the Slayer Gem
timeline.author: Hydrox6
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,6 +62,9 @@
 		ItemID.RED_SLAYER_HELMET_I,
 		ItemID.TURQUOISE_SLAYER_HELMET,
 		ItemID.TURQUOISE_SLAYER_HELMET_I,
+		ItemID.TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET,
+		ItemID.TWISTED_SLAYER_HELMET_I,
+		ItemID.TWISTED_HORNS,

timeline.message: fix horns mappings per comments from Hydrox6

timeline.bodyText: Pretty sure the normal slayer helmet doesn't have twisted horns 🤔
timeline.author: Hydrox6
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -232,6 +232,7 @@
 	ITEM_BOTTOMLESS_COMPOST_BUCKET(BOTTOMLESS_COMPOST_BUCKET, BOTTOMLESS_COMPOST_BUCKET_22997),
 	ITEM_BASILISK_JAW(BASILISK_JAW, NEITIZNOT_FACEGUARD),
 	ITEM_HELM_OF_NEITIZNOT(HELM_OF_NEITIZNOT, NEITIZNOT_FACEGUARD),
+	ITEM_TWISTED_HORNS(TWISTED_HORNS, SLAYER_HELMET, SLAYER_HELMET_I),

replies.bodyText:
I was going according to https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Twisted_horns
is there a better site for more accurate information?
replies.author: leopluerodon

replies.bodyText: No, the mapping is supposed to make the Twisted Slayer Helmets to the Horns
replies.author: Hydrox6

replies.bodyText: oh I understand now. Thanks for your patience while I am learning.
replies.author: leopluerodon

timeline.message: fix to map twisted helm instead of regular slayer helm
